dine.manager.title: Bar manager
dine.manager.onboard_to_unlock: Onboard your bar to unlock tools.
dine.onboard.identity.step1:
Bar identity — Step 1/4
Please reply with Bar/Restaurant name.
dine.onboard.identity.step2:
Bar identity — Step 2/4
Send your Location/Address.
Tip: tap '+' -> Share location (or type the address).
dine.onboard.payment.step3:
Payments — Step 3/4
Please reply with your MoMo code or MOMO number (07xxx).
dine.onboard.contacts.step4:
Orders — Step 4/4
Reply with the WhatsApp number(s) to receive orders (comma-separated).
Example: +2507xxxxxxx, +2507yyyyyyy
dine.onboard.upload.prompt:
Upload menu
Send your PDF of the menu in this chat now.
We will read and structure it automatically.
dine.manager.menu.upload_update.prompt:
Upload/Update menu
Send PDF/images now. New items will be added automatically.
dine.manager.publish.review_and_publish:
Review & publish
Confirm details and publish when ready.
dine.manager.numbers.remove_prompt:
Remove number
Reply with the number to remove (E.164), as listed.
dine.manager.publish.requested: Publish requested. We'll confirm once the menu is live.
